name: Save The Boy
description:
Save the Boy

Your son has gone missing in the darkwood and it's up to you bring him back. Perhaps Beelzebub himself is tormenting you. You'll need to summon all your courage to make it out of hell alive. 

Can you save him?

Blast your way through skeletons, zombies, and more as you search for Tommy in the hellscape of the portal world. 

Keyboard Controls:

Tab - Change Weapon
Mouse - Look
Mouse 1 - Shoot
Mouse 2 - Zoom
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Spacebar - Jump
R - Reload

Xbox Controller:

Right Trigger - Fire
Left Trigger - Zoom
Left Stick - Move
Y - Jump
X - Reload
B - Change Weapon
Right Stick - Look

Updates:
8/25/2019: Fixed a bug where the player couldn't move after dying and restarting.
